rows.name: Acidic Burst
rows.stacking_rules: Functions as Corrosive; on crit deals extra acid (x2 1d10, x3 2d10, x4 3d10). Burst works even if Corrosive not activated. Projectile weapons pass to ammo.

rows.name: Arcane Might
rows.stacking_rules: Swift action: sacrifice an arcane prepared spell/slot to add its level to the bow's next damage roll this turn.

rows.name: Aquan
rows.stacking_rules: Overcomes DR of fire-subtype creatures; +2d6 damage vs fire subtype. Fire-subtype wielders gain 1 negative level while wielded (can’t be removed while held). Projectile weapons pass to ammo.

rows.name: Aquatic
rows.stacking_rules: No penalties for using the weapon underwater (as freedom of movement for weapon use).

rows.name: Auran
rows.stacking_rules: Overcomes DR of earth-subtype creatures; +2d6 damage vs earth subtype. Earth-subtype wielders gain 1 negative level while wielded (can’t be removed while held). Projectile weapons pass to ammo.

rows.name: Banishing
rows.stacking_rules: Free action on hit vs extraplanar creature (26 HD or fewer): banish (Will DC 20 negates). +2 DC for each alignment/material trait the weapon has that matches the target’s DR requirement. 3/day. Projectile weapons pass to ammo.

rows.name: Berserker
rows.stacking_rules: While raging, weapon deals +1d8 damage on each successful attack.

rows.name: Binding
rows.stacking_rules: Swift action: your next successful hit before end of turn applies dimensional anchor for 10 minutes. 2/day. Projectile weapons pass to ammo.

rows.name: Blessed
rows.stacking_rules: Counts as good-aligned for DR (continuous). 3/day swift: auto-confirm all crit threats vs evil foes for 1 round (as bless weapon). Doesn’t stack for extra benefit with other crit-confirm/keen/vorpal effects.

rows.name: Blindsighted
rows.stacking_rules: Std action to activate: wielder gains blindsight 30 ft for 1 minute; negated by silence. 3/day.

rows.name: Bloodfeeding
rows.stacking_rules: Each hit on a living creature grants 1 blood point (max 10; store 1 hour). On a hit, free action to spend up to 5 points for +2 damage per point; you don’t gain a point from that same strike.

rows.name: Bloodstone
rows.stacking_rules: As spell storing but only vampiric touch; any stored spell is automatically Empowered. Holds only one spell.
rows.required_feat: Craft Magic Arms and Armor; Empower Spell

rows.name: Blurstrike
rows.stacking_rules: Swift: for 1 round, target is treated as flat-footed against your first attack with this weapon. No effect vs blindsight users or uncanny dodge. 10/day.

rows.name: Brash
rows.stacking_rules: If you rage while wielding: rage lasts +3 rounds; while raging you are immune to fear.

rows.name: Brutal Surge
rows.stacking_rules: After a successful melee hit, swift action to bull rush target using your stats; if two-handed, +2 on opposed Str check. You don’t move with target; movement provokes AoOs from others only. Uses/day = 1 + your Con bonus; once used, no other creature can use it until next day.

rows.name: Bodyfeeder
rows.stacking_rules: On a crit vs living target, gain temp HP equal to half the crit’s damage; lasts up to 1 minute; doesn’t stack with itself or other sources.
rows.required_spells: vampiric touch or claws of the vampire (EPH 84)

rows.name: Changeling
rows.stacking_rules: Swift command, 1/round: change between spear/shortspear/longspear of your size; also alter cosmetic appearance (materials/decoration) only.

rows.name: Chargebreaker
rows.stacking_rules: Any charging creature hit must make DC 14 Fort save or fall prone.

rows.name: Charging
rows.stacking_rules: While mounted, deal +2d6 damage on a successful charge attack.
rows.required_feat: Craft Magic Arms and Armor; Spirited Charge

rows.name: Collision
rows.stacking_rules: Each hit deals +5 damage. Projectile weapons pass to ammunition.

rows.name: Consumptive
rows.stacking_rules: Standard command to sheath weapon in negative energy (harmless to wielder); persists until commanded off; each hit vs living deals +1d8 damage. Projectile weapons pass to ammunition.

rows.name: Corrosive
rows.stacking_rules: Standard command to sheath weapon in acid (harmless to wielder); persists until commanded off; each hit deals +1d6 acid. Projectile weapons pass to ammunition.
rows.required_spells: acid fog OR acid storm (SC 7) OR Melf's acid arrow OR storm of vengeance

rows.name: Cursespewing
rows.stacking_rules: On a critical hit, target is cursed for 1 minute: –4 to attack rolls, saves, skill checks, and ability checks (not cumulative with itself).

rows.name: Deadly Precision
rows.stacking_rules: Deals +1d6 damage on successful sneak attack or sudden strike. No benefit without those class features; does not increase if you have both.

rows.name: Defensive Surge
rows.stacking_rules: After a successful melee attack in a round you used Combat Expertise or fought defensively, swift command to gain +2 AC until your next turn. Uses/day = 1 + your Int bonus; once used, no other creature can activate until next day.

rows.name: Desiccating
rows.stacking_rules: Each hit deals +1d4 damage to living; +1d8 vs plants and elementals with the water subtype. Projectile weapons pass to ammunition.

rows.name: Desiccating Burst
rows.stacking_rules: Functions as Desiccating. On a critical hit, deals extra damage by crit multiplier (x2 1d8; x3 2d8; x4 3d8); damage is doubled vs plants or water-subtype elementals. Also fatigues the target for 8 hours or until it drinks ~1 gallon of water. Projectile weapons pass to ammunition.

rows.name: Disarming
rows.stacking_rules: +2 bonus on disarm attempts; you can’t be disarmed of this weapon.

rows.name: Dislocator
rows.stacking_rules: Swift mental: your next hit before end of turn teleports the target up to 10 ft in any direction (Will DC 17 negates); can’t place into occupied space. 3/day. Projectile weapons pass to ammunition.

rows.name: Dislocator, Great
rows.stacking_rules: As Dislocator, but teleport distance up to 30 ft (Will DC 20 negates).

rows.name: Dispelling
rows.stacking_rules: On hit, free command to apply targeted dispel magic to the struck creature/object. 3/day.

rows.name: Dispelling, Greater
rows.stacking_rules: As Dispelling, but applies targeted greater dispel magic. 3/day.

rows.name: Divine Wrath
rows.stacking_rules: Swift mental: expend a turn undead attempt to charge the weapon for 1 round; if your next hit is against an undead, it deals +1d6 damage per point of your Cha bonus (minimum +1d6).
rows.required_spells: searing light; requires turn undead and good alignment

rows.name: Domineering
rows.stacking_rules: Creature hit is shaken for 1 minute (Will DC 16 negates). Doesn’t stack with itself or other fear effects.

rows.name: Doom Burst
rows.stacking_rules: On a critical hit, target becomes shaken (no save) for 5 rounds, even if normally immune to crit extra damage. Doesn’t stack with itself or other fear effects.

rows.name: Dragondoom
rows.stacking_rules: Up to 3/day as a swift command, declare a smite vs a Large or larger dragon before the attack roll; on hit add +1d6 damage per size category above Medium (Large +1d6; Huge +2d6; Gargantuan +3d6; Colossal +4d6). Miss or non-dragon wastes the smite.

rows.name: Dragonhunter
rows.stacking_rules: On hit vs a dragon, target takes 1 Str damage. Critical multiplier increases by 1 against dragons (e.g., longbow x4 vs dragons). Effects that alter threatening/confirming criticals (e.g., keen edge, bless weapon) don’t function on a weapon with this property.

rows.name: Eager
rows.stacking_rules: Can be drawn as a free action. While wielded: +2 initiative; +2 damage during the surprise round and the first round of combat.

rows.name: Energy Aura
rows.stacking_rules: Standard command to choose acid, cold, electricity, or fire; each hit deals +1d6 of the chosen type until reactivated to change it. Harmless to wielder. Projectile weapons pass to ammunition.
rows.required_spells: chill metal; flame blade; Melf's acid arrow; shocking grasp

rows.name: Energy Surge
rows.costing: +1 bonus (Synergy; requires Corrosive, Flaming, Frost, or Shock)
rows.stacking_rules: Functions as the prerequisite energy property. On a successful melee hit, swift command to deal +3d6 of the same energy type to the target; uses/day = 1 + your Con bonus. The prerequisite property need not be active. A weapon can take this property multiple times (once per listed prerequisite); each activation triggers only one surge. Once you activate this property, no other creature can activate it until the next day.
rows.required_spells: Spell(s) corresponding to the chosen prerequisite property (corrosive/flaming/frost/shock)

rows.name: Enervating
rows.stacking_rules: On a critical hit vs a living creature, target gains 1 negative level; lost after 1 hour (no permanent drain).

rows.name: Ethereal Reaver
rows.stacking_rules: Functions as ghost touch. Also grants see invisibility to the wielder.

rows.name: Everbright
rows.stacking_rules: Standard command 2/day: all creatures within 20 ft are blinded for 1 round (Reflex DC 14 negates). Weapon is immune to acid damage and rusting effects.

rows.name: Fiercebane
rows.stacking_rules: Functions as bane vs the same designated creature type/subtype as the prerequisite. Glows when a designated foe is within 60 ft. On a critical hit vs its designated foe, deals extra damage by crit multiplier: x2 +1d10; x3 +2d10; x4 +3d10. Projectile weapons bestow this on ammunition.

rows.name: Fleshgrinding
rows.stacking_rules: Free command when you damage a living creature: release the weapon; for 5 rounds at the start of your turns it deals automatic damage as a normal hit (includes enhancement, properties, and your Str bonus; excludes feat-based extra damage). Anyone other than you can pull it free with a standard action and DC 20 Str check. After duration it returns to your hand (as returning) unless held by the target.

rows.name: Force
rows.stacking_rules: Ammunition becomes a force attack: automatically overcomes DR, ignores incorporeal miss chance, but doesn’t affect creatures immune to force. Damage as normal for the ammunition.

rows.name: Ghost Strike
rows.stacking_rules: Functions as ghost touch. Sneak attacks and critical hits against undead apply as if they were living.

rows.name: Harmonizing
rows.stacking_rules: +2 competence bonus on Perform (sing). If you begin a bardic music effect while holding the weapon, starting 1 round later the weapon continues the performance for up to 10 rounds (or until you start another such effect or end it as a swift mental action).
rows.required_spells: ghost sound; requires bardic music class feature
